value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Listen up, troops! The eastern
reaches of Askr are under attack!
They're targeting Gnótthæð!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Is it Embla?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We don't know. The soldier who
carried the report is unconscious...
with terrible burns all over his body.$k$pIn his suffering, he repeats one
phrase, again and again: "the
flames..."$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The flames...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|We must find out what's going on. It's
well past time we left. Make your
preparations quickly and move out!$k$p

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What...has happened?$k$pThis place was famous for its bountiful
farmland... But you'd never know it
now.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We...we used to come here with
Mother when we were children... This
is a cruel rebuke to my memories.$k$pBeyond cruel...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Alfonse! Sharena! Be on your guard!
The enemy is here!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|They're marching under the Emblian
banner—that's certain.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|So it is Embla that's behind this. I'll
never forgive them!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hold a moment, Sister.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Why?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Take a look at these flames...$k$pThey're not dying down. In fact, they
seem to grow even hotter... I've never
seen anything like it before.$k$pFlames like this could turn a river into
nothing but steam...$k$pFlames undying...unquenchable...$k$pThe prophecy... Can it be?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What? No! That's just a silly old book.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What are you two bickering about?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|There's a very old book of prophecy...
It tells of the end of the world.$k$p$EFace_Cool|"Cloaked in flame, he crosses the
sea—unquenchable, insatiable,
undying flame.$k$p"Trees fall, mountains burn, steam
billows. The seas are swallowed.$k$p"Stars become cinders, and the moon
falls from the sky.$k$p"The world, devoured by flame,
smolders out."$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Smolders...out? You can't mean that
it's destroyed, can you?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We need to find out more about who
we're really up against. We have to
keep pushing forward.$k$pI wish I knew just what we're facing.$k$p$Sbs150|
